title: Kuro to Kin no Akanai Kagi.
synopsis: Katagiri Kanade is a hikikomori who spent her days lazing off in her room. Her specialty is her broad imagination which often leads to various wild delusions. One night a weird cowboy guy appeared in her dream, saying that he's her heart's hero. Due to his encouragement, Kanade decided to try and go have a haircut the next day. It was then when she met a mysterious guy who cut her hair in the park, giving her courage to resume her school days.
characters: ['Sonomura, Ikuto', 'Katagari, Kanade', 'Konno, Chihiro', 'Hasui, Tomoomi', 'Sudou, Yukio', 'Shiraki, Kotoko', 'Komine, Tatsuki']
voices: ['Hino, Satoshi', 'Sakuno, Airi', 'Hirakawa, Daisuke', 'Mizushima, Takahiro', 'Sakiware, Spoon', 'Harada, Hitomi', 'Terashima, Takuma']
